description: {"blocks":[{"key":"57pb7","text":"This protocol describes the the methodology of nuclei isolation for Single Cell ATAC Sequencing adopted from 10X Genomics guide CG000169 Revision D. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"3vf1k","text":"Handling, use, storage, and disposal of human tissues must be conducted in a respectful manner in line with Human Tissue Authority (HTA) guidelines, reflecting the sensitive nature and origin of the material.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae58q","text":"Ensure prior to start that collection, carriage, and receipt of tissues is compliant with all HTA guidelines, including Research Ethics Service/Committee approval, and thorough labelling and tracking of all human materials.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
